column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Katara says : " Aang ? "
#Text=Aang says : " Hey , come on little guy .
#Text=" Aang says : " You got a deal !
#Text=Just one little problem ... I 'm an airbender , not a waterbender .
#Text=Is n't there someone in your tribe who can teach you ?
#Text=" Katara says : " No .
#Text=You 're looking at the only waterbender in the whole South Pole .
#Text=" Aang says : " This is n't right .
#Text=A waterbender needs to master water .
#Text=What about the North Pole ?
#Text=There 's another Water Tribe up there , right ?
#Text=Maybe they have waterbenders who could teach you .
#Text=" Katara says : " Maybe , but we have n't had contact with our sister tribe in a long time .
#Text=It 's not exactly " turn right at the second glacier " .
#Text=It 's on the other side of the world .
#Text=" Aang says : " But you forget , I have a flying bison .
#Text=Appa and I can personally fly you to the North Pole .
#Text=Katara , we 're going to find you a master !
#Text=" Katara says : " That 's ... I mean , I do n't know .
#Text=I 've never left home before .
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , you think about it , but in the meantime , can you teach me catch one of these penguins ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Okay , listen closely my young pupil .
#Text=Catching penguins is an ancient and sacred art .
#Text=Observe !
#Text=" Aang says : " Hi hi hi !
#Text=Ha , ha , ha !
#Text="
